holidays.title: National Meow Like a Pirate Day
holidays.description: Since pirates are rarely seen without a cat, it’s only fitting to include them.

holidays.title: Talk Like a Pirate Day
holidays.description: Ahoy, me hearties! So ye want to talk like a pirate, eh?

holidays.title: Aortic Dissection Awareness Day
holidays.description: Join us as we learn vital information about Aortic Dissection Awareness Day.

holidays.title: Day of the Glories of the Army
holidays.description: Chile’s Independence Day celebrations continue during the Day of the Glories of the Army’s long-awaited parades.

holidays.title: National Butterscotch Pudding Day
holidays.description: Get ready to take a trip to culinary paradise with this tasty delight.

holidays.title: National Cat DNA Day
holidays.description: Join cat lovers as we celebrate one of man’s absolute favorite companions!

holidays.title: National Jude Day
holidays.description: This special holiday is dedicated to celebrating all the Judes out there, famous or not!

holidays.title: National Woman Road Warrior Day
holidays.description: Juggling housework and a hectic work schedule that requires travel isn’t easy. That’s what makes these women warriors.

holidays.title: Respect for the Aged Day
holidays.description: Our elders are our link to the past and they contribute to our future.

holidays.title: Erica Ash’s Birthday
holidays.description: American actress, comedian, singer, and model Erica Ash keeps stealing our hearts with her incredible performances!

holidays.title: Freddie Dredd’s Birthday
holidays.description: Gritty sounds, darkly funny lyrics, and an intense vibe turn Dredd's music into an experience.

holidays.title: Jimmy Fallon’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nothing is impossible for this T.V. host, producer, comedian, writer, singer, and actor.

holidays.title: Sabrina Claudio’s Birthday
holidays.description: We are excited to see how this gifted pop star will progress in her career.

holidays.title: Sky Days’s Birthday
holidays.description: For Sky Days, desperate moments call for desperate measures, no matter the cost!
